title: JustTwo
author: JustTwo
content: A challenge that many face with Web3 / NFTs is their lack of smart contracting skills.To address this, FeverTokens has developed a no-code solution for content creators and businesses to customize advanced smart contract features via a simple UI.With an experience like Shopify or WordPress, everyone can operate their own OpenSea.Most importantly, you own all the smart contracts.It is FREE to start, and we only get paid when you get paid.Start experimenting here: https://app.fevertokens.io/Ask us any questions that you may have in this thread.

comments.body: Is this like having my own shop on the crypto world? also can my users who are not cyrpto friendly use my shop without having a wallet?

comments.author: JustTwo
comments.body: Quote from: eltgol on August 03, 2022, 01:14:25 PMSounds promising!QuoteWith OpenSea, you don't own the smart contracts.what do you mean I own all the smart contracts? how do I check if I am the owner of the smart contract or not?Smart contracts deployed have role-based access controls. As the "owner" of the smart contract, you have all privileges to trigger functions built into the contracts. You can also set up other roles in the smart contracts using FeverTokens' UI or SDK. FeverTokens has no roles in them.With third-party platforms, they have superior access control rights to the smart contracts and can trigger functions without your consent.
